description:
Take your skiing and riding to the next level. Experience supreme comfort all day while on the mountain with these luxurious liners. With a softer flexing lay-up and roomy toe box, you'll look forward to putting them on.

  • Best suited for ski touring and telemark and backcountry applications
  • Anti-microbial lining keeps odours at bay
  • Low volume liner fits looser, great if your boots are slightly too tight
  • Can be heat-molded with the Home Fitting Kit or worn straight out of the box. (Sold separately)
  • For a stiffer feel the Power Tongue can replace the standard Flex Tongue. (Sold separately)
  • Select the same size as your boot shells. For half sizes, size up
name: Intuition LV Pro Tour Boot Liner - Unisex
